site.title: Equineist.com
site.description: A comprehensive resource for horse-owners, riders, athletes, and enthusiasts. Explore expert insights, training tips, equine therapy, and the deep bond between humans and horses.
site.desc: Equineist.com is my mission: a sanctuary for riders and horse lovers seeking truth, not trends.  Born from the fire of personal healing and a broken system, it’s where I share hard-won wisdom on ethical horsemanship, real discipline, and the profound bond between human and horse.
site.desc_2: To protect horses from ignorance and ego, empower riders with knowledge, and honor the promise that changed my life. This isn’t just about riding, it’s about becoming better people through our partnership with these incredible beings.
site.tagline: For horse-owners, Riders and Horse Lovers!
site.author: Hamza Mu
